source group


macros for grouping files


ame_source_group

macro(ame_source_group)
type: Cmake macro
description: group files from current source directory by keeping filesystem layout
called when adding a library or an executable target
excludes cmake files

ame_source_group_add_file

macro(ame_source_group_add_file p_files p_folder)
type: Cmake macro
description: source group files to specific folder
p_files: list of files to group
p_folder: name of group

ame_source_group_param

macro(ame_source_group_param p_dir)
type: Cmake macro
description: source group a directory
p_dir: path to seearch files from

ame_source_group_recursive

macro(ame_source_group_recursive p_folderPath p_parentList p_recursive)
type: Cmake macro
description: recursive macro to group files
will list files in parameter folder and
p_folderPath: folder to group files from
p_parentList: list of files already grouped
p_recursive: call macro on folderPath sub-folders
